title: Campaign Tracking Logs
description: Campaign marketing events such as opens, clicks,links and impressions.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.title: External Identifier
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.description: External Identifier that defines the primary identity value for profile and audience.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.title: Campaign Identifier
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.description: Identifier of the marketing campaign to which activity originating this message belongs to.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.title: Campaign Name
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.description: Internal Name that uniquely identifies the Campaign.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.title: Campaign Label
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.description: A human-friendly label of the marketing campaign which is originating this message.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.title: Delivery Log Identifier
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.description: Identifier of the marketing campaign delivery log this event belongs to.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.title: Delivery Identifier
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.description: The delivery activity originating this message.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.title: Visitor Identifier
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.description: Visitor that was targeted as part of the delivery.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.title: Recipient Identifer
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.description: Recipient that was targeted as part of this delivery.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.title: Service Identifier
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.description: Subscribed Service that targeted this delivery.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.title: Delivery Name
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.description: Internal Name that uniquely identifies the delivery.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.title: Delivery Label
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.description: A human-friendly label of the delivery which is originating this message.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.title: Delivery Mode
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.description: Mode of delivery for the messages sent.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.title: Tracking Log Identifier
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.description: Primary Key of the tracking log.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.title: URL Category
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.description: The category of the link. It may be `subscription`, or a user-defined category.
